itunes:title: MAR 16 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 21 UPDATE
title: MAR 16 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 21 UPDATE
description:
A new report from the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) states that Russian forces have attacked northwest of Kiev, but are likely unable to complete the encirclement of Kiev. Before the war in Ukraine began, Western Intelligence had received financing and collaboration from various non-governmental organizations, meanwhile Saudi Arabia is speaking with Beijing to accept yuan instead of U.S. dollars for Chinese oil. Lastly, the U.S. Consulate was shut down after being hit with gunfire and explosions near the U.S. - Mexican border. Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

To get $500 of free silver on a qualifying purchase go to https://allegiancegold.com/POSO/ with code POSO

To save on MyPillow go to http://www.MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO

For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘Exposing China’s Greatest Lie’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=am8XznQzxR0
content:encoded:
A new report from the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) states that Russian forces have attacked northwest of Kiev, but are likely unable to complete the encirclement of Kiev. Before the war in Ukraine began, Western Intelligence had received financing and collaboration from various non-governmental organizations, meanwhile Saudi Arabia is speaking with Beijing to accept yuan instead of U.S. dollars for Chinese oil. Lastly, the U.S. Consulate was shut down after being hit with gunfire and explosions near the U.S. - Mexican border. Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
